TopicTitle: Are there still mod version compatible with 1.0.5?

Articles.Content: As I have 1.0.5 now, (I'm too lazy to update it) are there any mods that I can still get their older versions? Thanks

Most mods still have their earlier versions available. Mods that are hosted on GitHub or Curse probably still have releases for 1.0.5, mods that are on SpaceDock might not since releases hosted on KerbalStuff might have been lost. Also keep in mind that some mods have had several author changes and you sometimes need to dig up older release threads to find the mods you want.

Too lazy to update KSP...

Too lazy to look for favorite mods to see if there are old versions.

Wants forum to find them...

In the time it took you to come to the forums and post this thread (and read my reply) you probably could have updated KSP.  Just do it.

Too lazy to look for favorite mods to see if there are old versions.

Wants forum to find them...

In the time it took you to come to the forums and post this thread (and read my reply) you probably could have updated KSP.  Just do it.

I remember I got an older version of a mod but it didn't work...
It's probably less work to update KSP than to hunt down old versions of mods.
